Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the limited credit time allowances for certain incarcerated individuals
Summary: Increases the limited credit time allowances for certain incarcerated individuals serving indeterminate or determinate sentences imposed for specified offenses up to twenty-four months.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the limited credit time allowances for certain incarcerated individuals
